{"id":680964981,"lang":"cpp","time":"3 days, 6 hours","timestamp":1650041342,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"287 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/680964981/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum White Tiles After Covering With Carpets","memory":"110.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minimumWhiteTiles(string floor, int C, int L) {\n        int n = floor.length();\n        vector<vector<int>> dp(C+1, vector<int>(n+1, 0));\n        for (int f = 1; f <= n; ++f)\n            dp[0][f] = dp[0][f-1] + (floor[f-1] == '1');\n        \n        for (int c = 1; c <= C; ++c) {\n            \n            for (int f = 0; f <= n; ++f) {\n                if (f < L) {\n                    dp[c][f] = 1e9 + 7;\n                } else {\n                    dp[c][f] = min(dp[c][f-1] + (floor[f-1] - '0'), \n                                  (f >= c * L) ? dp[c-1][f-L] : dp[c-1][f - f % L]);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return dp[C][n];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-white-tiles-after-covering-with-carpets"}
